modName: Miley Skyrus - a Bard and Follower
summary:
Miley Skyrus
- Bard in Solitude
Location Winking Skeever
- Nord-Race
- CBBE / Sevenbase/ UNP / UNPB
- marriageable
- Dwarven Armor and Sword
descriptionHtml:
[B][I][COLOR=#C00000][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=10]Miley Skyrus[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/I][/B]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/S2BN2VK.gif[/IMG] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IS3AVA3.gif[/IMG]
[B][I][COLOR=#C00000][FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=3]-AFT Dance Animations-[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/I][/B]

She was born 21 years ago and lives in Solitude.
After she discovered her musical talent she has become
a bard at the solitude bards college.

Miley spends her days and nights in the Winking Skeever,
Solitudes first and only choise regarding a party location.
She loves to entertain, playing the lute or flute and
of course she sings.

From time to time she likes to follow a brave adventurer
and exchanges her flute for a sword.

So it is up to you to find her and take her with you for a new big
adventure and discover her talents!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/y4TAFv2.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/h7deKLy.jpg[/IMG]

[COLOR=#C00000][I][B][SIZE=3]Installation:[/SIZE][/B][/I][/COLOR]

Install using NMM, or just simply drop the files
into the Skyrim Data folder in there respective places.

I fixed the name of the Winking Skeever and a
possible "Throw Voice bug" (thank you AdriRaven
for informing me!)


[COLOR=#C00000][I][B][SIZE=3]Recommended Mods:[/SIZE][/B][/I][/COLOR]

For dance animations:
Dance Animations - Shake it by indexMemories
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14521/?

Follower Management:
Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?

ENB in the (most) Screenshots:
Seasons of Skyrim ENB True HDR by Bronze316
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23812/?


For the Armor like in the Screenshots:
Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide and BBP by ChronoTrigger77
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259/?

For the Armor-Textures:
aMidianBorn Book of Silence by CaBaL- EmeraldReign-the AMB team
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?



I played Skyrim Vanilla until September 2013 and
with first Mods since October 2013. On the 12th of this April
was the time I opened the Creation Kit and started using NifScope ;D
So if you find any errors please report them to me!
I will try to fix them as soon as possible. :)




[I][B][COLOR=#C00000][SIZE=3]Permissions:
[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B][/I]
This is a NEXUS EXCLUSIVE so please don't re-upload
it to another site.
Feel free to add your pics, i like seeing them!



[I][B][COLOR=#C00000][SIZE=3]Credits:[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B][/I]

Thank you for your great works and permissions!
